numbered_ace_sentences: 1. These sports leagues are major sports leagues.
2. In these sports leagues, the majority of players are players of color.
3. However, in these sports leagues, there are fewer coaches of color than players of color.
4. I wonder what causes this situation.
5. I am a person of color.
6. This situation shows different statistics for people of color.
7. This situation shows different opportunities for people of color.
10. This situation displays diversity among members of sports leagues.
11. The graph lists several sports leagues.
12. In all listed sports leagues, the ratio of players of color to coaches of color is around 4:1 on average.
13. The graph indicates differences in race among modern sports leagues.
14. The graph indicates differences in diversity among modern sports leagues.
